name: idcncfg
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c0, ccncf, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c0, ccncf, c1)), wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c0, ccncf, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c0, ccncf, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c0, ccncf, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c0, ccncf, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c0, ccncf, c1)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c0, ccncf, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: The identity function is a continuous function on ` CC ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
